account_name.Description: Account name. This can be used for logging in to CloudN console or UserConnect controller.

aws_account_number.Description: AWS Account number to associate with Aviatrix account. Should be 12 digits.

awsgov_account_number.Description: AWS Gov Account number to associate with Aviatrix account.

gcloud_project_credentials_filepath.Description: GCloud Project credentials local file path.

oci_api_private_key_filepath.Description: OCI API Private Key local file path.

account_name.Description: Cloud account name of user to be created.

email.Description: Email of address of account user to be created.

password.Description: Login password for the account user to be created.

username.Description: Name of account user to be created.

account_name1.Description: This parameter represents the name of an Azure Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

account_name2.Description: This parameter represents the name of an Azure Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

vnet_cidr1.Description: List of VNet CIDR of vnet_name_resource_group1.

vnet_cidr2.Description: List of VNet CIDR of vnet_name_resource_group2.

account_name1.Description: This parameter represents the name of an AWS Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

account_name2.Description: This parameter represents the name of an AWS Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

rtb_list1_output.Description: List of route table ID of vpc_id1.

rtb_list2_output.Description: List of route table ID of vpc_id2.

account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

attached_aviatrix_transit_gateway.Description: A list of Names of Aviatrix Transit Gateway to attach to one of the three default domains.

aws_side_as_number.Description: BGP Local ASN (Autonomous System Number), Integer between 1-65535.

security_domains.Description: Security Domains to create together with AWS TGW's creation.

attached_vpc.Description: A list of VPCs attached to the domain.

customized_route_advertisement.Description: Advanced option. Customized route(s) to be advertised to other VPCs that are connected to the same TGW.

customized_routes.Description: Advanced option. Customized Spoke VPC Routes. It allows the admin to enter non-RFC1918 routes in the VPC route table targeting the TGW.

disable_local_route_propagation.Description: Advanced option. If set to true, it disables automatic route propagation of this VPC to other VPCs within the same security domain.

route_tables.Description: Advanced option. Route tables separated by ',' to participate in TGW Orchestrator, i.e., learned routes will be propagated to these route tables.

subnets.Description: Advanced option. VPC subnets separated by ',' to attach to the VPC. If left blank, Aviatrix Controller automatically selects a subnet representing each AZ for the VPC attachment.

vpc_account_name.Description: The name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller associated with this VPC.

vpc_id.Description: This parameter represents the ID of the VPC.

aviatrix_firewall.Description: Set to true if the security domain is an aviatrix firewall domain.

connected_domains.Description: A list of domains connected to the domain.

native_egress.Description: Set to true if the security domain is a native egress domain.

native_firewall.Description: Set to true if the security domain is a native firewall domain.

security_domain_name.Description: Name of the security domain created.

tgw_name.Description: Name of the AWS TGW which is going to be created.

directconnect_account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of an Account in Aviatrix controller.

dx_gateway_id.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Direct Connect Gateway ID.

security_domain_name.Description: The name of an Aviatrix security domain, to which the direct connect gateway will be attached.

tgw_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of an AWS TGW.

customized_route_advertisement.Description: Advanced option. Customized route(s) to be advertised to other VPCs that are connected to the same TGW.

customized_routes.Description: Advanced option. Customized Spoke VPC Routes. It allows the admin to enter non-RFC1918 routes in the VPC route table targeting the TGW.

disable_local_route_propagation.Description: Advanced option. If set to true, it disables automatic route propagation of this VPC to other VPCs within the same security domain.

route_tables.Description: Advanced option. Route tables separated by ',' to participate in TGW Orchestrator, i.e., learned routes will be propagated to these route tables.

security_domain_name.Description: The name of the security domain.

subnets.Description: Advanced option. VPC subnets separated by ',' to attach to the VPC. If left blank, Aviatrix Controller automatically selects a subnet representing each AZ for the VPC attachment.

vpc_account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

vpc_id.Description: This parameter represents the ID of the VPC.

connection_type.Description: Connection type. Valid values: 'dynamic', 'static'. 'dynamic' stands for a BGP VPN connection; 'static' stands for a static VPN connection. Default value: 'dynamic'.

inside_ip_cidr_tun_1.Description: Inside IP CIDR for Tunnel 1. A /30 CIDR in 169.254.0.0/16.

inside_ip_cidr_tun_2.Description: Inside IP CIDR for Tunnel 2. A /30 CIDR in 169.254.0.0/16.

pre_shared_key_tun_1.Description: Pre-Shared Key for Tunnel 1. A 8-64 character string with alphanumeric, underscore(_) and dot(.). It cannot start with 0

pre_shared_key_tun_2.Description: Pre-Shared Key for Tunnel 2. A 8-64 character string with alphanumeric, underscore(_) and dot(.). It cannot start with 0

remote_as_number.Description: AWS side as a number. Integer between 1-65535. Example: '12'. Required for a dynamic VPN connection.

remote_cidr.Description: Remote CIDRs joined as a string with ','. Required for a static VPN connection.

route_domain_name.Description: The name of a route domain, to which the vpn will be attached.

tgw_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of an AWS TGW.

account_name1.Description: This parameter represents the name of an Azure Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

account_name2.Description: This parameter represents the name of an Azure Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

vnet_cidr1.Description: List of VNet CIDR of vnet_name_resource_group1.

vnet_cidr2.Description: List of VNet CIDR of vnet_name_resource_group2.

spoke_account_name.Description: An Aviatrix account that corresponds to a subscription in Azure.

spoke_vpc_id.Description: Combination of the Spoke VNet name and resource group.

transit_gateway_name.Description: Name of an azure transit gateway with transit firenet enabled.

backup_account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

backup_cloud_type.Description: Type of cloud service provider, requires an integer value. Use 1 for AWS.

backup_configuration.Description: Switch to enable/disable controller cloudn backup config.

http_access.Description: Switch for http access. Default: false.

multiple_backups.Description: Switch to enable the controller to backup up to a maximum of 3 rotating backups.

security_group_management.Description: Used to manage the Controller instanceâ€™s inbound rules from gateways.

target_version.Description: The release version number to which the controller will be upgraded to.

firewall_instance_association.Description: List of firewall instances to be associated with fireNet.

attached.Description: Switch to attach/detach firewall instance to/from fireNet.

egress_interface.Description: Egress interface ID, required if it is a firewall instance.

firenet_gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway to launch the firewall instance.

firewall_name.Description: Firewall instance name, or FQDN Gateway's gw_name, required if it is a firewall instance.

instance_id.Description: ID of Firewall instance, or FQDN Gateway's gw_name.

lan_interface.Description: Lan interface ID, required if it is a firewall instance.

management_interface.Description: Management interface ID, required if it is a firewall instance.

vendor_type.Description: Indication it is a firewall instance or FQDN gateway to be associated to fireNet. Valid values: 'Generic', 'fqdn_gateway'. Value 'fqdn_gateway' is required for FQDN gateway.

base_log_enabled.Description: Indicates whether enable logging or not. Valid values: true or false.

policy.Description: New access policy for the gateway.

action.Description: Valid values: 'allow', 'deny' or 'force-drop'(in stateful firewall rule to allow immediate packet dropping on established sessions).

dst_ip.Description: CIDRs separated by comma or tag names such 'HR' or 'marketing' etc.

port.Description: A single port or a range of port numbers.

src_ip.Description: CIDRs separated by comma or tag names such 'HR' or 'marketing' etc.

firenet_gw_name.Description: Name of the primary FireNet gateway.

firewall_image.Description: One of the AWS AMIs from Palo Alto Networks.

firewall_name.Description: Name of the firewall instance to be created.

instance_id.Description: ID of the firewall instance created.

key_name.Description: The .pem file name for SSH access to the firewall instance.

username.Description: Applicable to Azure deployment only. 'admin' as a username is not accepted.

management_access_resource_name.Description: Name of the resource to be enabled firewall management access.

transit_firenet_gateway_name.Description: Name of the transit firenet gateway.

cidr_list.Description: A JSON file with information of 'cidr_tag_name' and 'cidr'.

cidr.Description: The CIDR attribute of a policy.

cidr_tag_name.Description: The name attribute of a policy.

firewall_tag.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

domain_names.Description: A list of one or more domain names.

fqdn_enabled.Description: FQDN Filter Tag Status. Valid values: true or false.

fqdn_mode.Description: Specify the tag color to be a white-list tag or black-list tag. 'white' or 'black'

gw_filter_tag_list.Description: A list of gateways to attach to the specific tag.

gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway to attach to the specific tag.

source_ip_list.Description: List of source IPs in the VPC qualified for a specific tag.

account_name.Description: Account name. This account will be used to launch Aviatrix gateway.

additional_cidrs.Description: A list of destination CIDR ranges that will also go through the VPN tunnel when Split Tunnel Mode is enabled.

additional_cidrs_designated_gateway.Description: A list of CIDR ranges separated by comma to configure when 'designated_gateway' feature is enabled.

allocate_new_eip.Description: When value is false, reuse an idle address in Elastic IP pool for this gateway. Otherwise, allocate a new Elastic IP and use it for this gateway.

backup_public_ip.Description: Private IP address of the Gateway created.

duo_api_hostname.Description: API hostname for DUO auth mode.

duo_integration_key.Description: Integration key for DUO auth mode.

duo_secret_key.Description: Secret key for DUO auth mode.

eip.Description: Required when allocate_new_eip is false. It uses specified EIP for this gateway.

elb_name.Description: A name for the ELB that is created.

enable_designated_gateway.Description: Enable 'designated_gateway' feature for Gateway. Only supports AWS. Valid values: true, false.

enable_elb.Description: Specify whether to enable ELB or not.

enable_encrypt_volume.Description: Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS provider. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enable_ldap.Description: Specify whether to enable LDAP or not. Supported values: 'yes' and 'no'.

enable_vpc_dns_server.Description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Only supports AWS. Valid values: true, false.

enable_vpn_nat.Description: This field indicates whether to enable VPN NAT or not. Only supported for VPN gateway. Valid values: true, false. Default value: true.

insane_mode.Description: Enable Insane Mode for Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Gateway. Required if insane_mode is set.

ldap_base_dn.Description: LDAP base DN. Required: Yes if enable_ldap is 'yes'.

ldap_bind_dn.Description: LDAP bind DN. Required: Yes if enable_ldap is 'yes'.

ldap_password.Description: LDAP password. Required: Yes if enable_ldap is 'yes'.

ldap_server.Description: LDAP server address. Required: Yes if enable_ldap is 'yes'.

ldap_username_attribute.Description: LDAP user attribute. Required: Yes if enable_ldap is 'yes'.

name_servers.Description: A list of DNS servers used to resolve domain names by a connected VPN user when Split Tunnel Mode is enabled.

okta_username_suffix.Description: Username suffix for Okta auth mode.

peering_ha_cloud_instance_id.Description: Instance ID of the peering HA gateway.

peering_ha_eip.Description: Public IP address that you want assigned to the HA peering instance.

peering_ha_insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Peering HA Gateway. Required if insane_mode is set.

peering_ha_subnet.Description: Public Subnet Information while creating Peering HA Gateway, only subnet is accepted. Required to create peering ha gateway if cloud_type = 1 or 8 (AWS or AZURE)

peering_ha_zone.Description: Zone information for creating Peering HA Gateway. Required to create peering ha gateway if cloud_type = 4 (gcp)

private_ip.Description: Private IP address of the Gateway created.

public_dns_server.Description: NS server used by the gateway.

public_ip.Description: Public IP address of the Gateway created.

saml_enabled.Description: This field indicates whether to enable SAML or not.

search_domains.Description: A list of domain names that will use the NameServer when a specific name is not in the destination when Split Tunnel Mode is enabled.

security_group_id.Description: Security group used for the gateway.

single_az_ha.Description: Set to true if this feature is desired.

single_ip_snat.Description: Enable Source NAT for this container.

subnet.Description: A VPC Network address range selected from one of the available network ranges.

vpc_id.Description: ID of legacy VPC/Vnet to be connected.

vpc_reg.Description: Region where this gateway will be launched.

vpn_access.Description: Enable user access through VPN to this container.

vpn_cidr.Description: VPN CIDR block for the container.

vpn_protocol.Description: Elb protocol for VPN gateway with elb enabled. Only supports AWS provider. Valid values: 'TCP', 'UDP'. If not specified, 'TCP'' will be used.

dnat_policy.Description: Policy rule to be applied to gateway.

dnat_ips.Description: This is a rule field that specifies the translated destination IP address when all specified qualifier conditions meet. When left blank, this field is not used. One of the rule field must be specified for this rule to take effect.

dnat_port.Description: This is a rule field that specifies the translated destination port when all specified qualifier conditions meet. When left blank, this field is not used. One of the rule field must be specified for this rule to take effect.

dst_cidr.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a destination IP address range where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

dst_port.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a destination port where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

exclude_rtb.Description: This field specifies which VPC private route table will not be programmed with the default route entry.

interface.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies output interface where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

mark.Description: This is a rule field that specifies a tag or mark of a TCP session when all qualifier conditions meet. When left blank, this field is not used.

protocol.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a destination port protocol where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

src_cidr.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a source IP address range where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

src_port.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a source port that the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

dst_cidr.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a destination IP address range where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

dst_port.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a destination port where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

exclude_rtb.Description: This field specifies which VPC private route table will not be programmed with the default route entry.

interface.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies output interface where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

mark.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a tag or mark of a TCP session where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

protocol.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a destination port protocol where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

snat_ips.Description: This is a rule field that specifies the changed source IP address when all specified qualifier conditions meet. When left blank, this field is not used. One of the rule fields must be specified for this rule to take effect.

snat_port.Description: This is a rule field that specifies the changed source port when all specified qualifier conditions meet. When left blank, this field is not used. One of the rule fields must be specified for this rule to take effect.

src_cidr.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a source IP address range where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

src_port.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a source port that the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

cloud_type.Description: Type of cloud service provider, requires an integer value. Currently only AWS(1) is supported.

domain_name.Description: The hosted domain name. It must be hosted by AWS Route53 or Azure DNS in the selected account.

elb_dns_names.Description: List of ELB names to attach to this Geo VPN name.

service_name.Description: The hostname that users will connect to. A DNS record will be created for this name in the specified domain name.

custom_entity_id.Description: Custom Entity ID. Required to be non-empty for 'Custom' Entity ID type, empty for 'Hostname'.

custom_algorithms.Description: Switch to enable custom/non-default algorithms for IPSec Authentication/Encryption.

enable_active_active.Description: Switch to Enable/Disable active_active_ha for an existing site2cloud connection.

enable_dead_peer_detection.Description: Switch to Enable/Disable Deed Peer Detection for an existing site2cloud connection.

ha_enabled.Description: Specify whether enabling HA or not.

phase_1_authentication.Description: Phase one Authentication. Valid values: 'SHA-1', 'SHA-256', 'SHA-384' and 'SHA-512'.

phase_1_dh_groups.Description: Phase one DH Groups. Valid values: '1', '2', '5', '14', '15', '16', '17' and '18'.

phase_1_encryption.Description: Phase one Encryption. Valid values: '3DES', 'AES-128-CBC', 'AES-192-CBC' and 'AES-256-CBC'.

phase_2_authentication.Description: Phase two Authentication. Valid values: 'NO-AUTH', 'HMAC-SHA-1', 'HMAC-SHA-256', 'HMAC-SHA-384' and 'HMAC-SHA-512'.

phase_2_dh_groups.Description: Phase two DH Groups. Valid values: '1', '2', '5', '14', '15', '16', '17' and '18'.

phase_2_encryption.Description: Phase two Encryption. Valid values: '3DES', 'AES-128-CBC', 'AES-192-CBC', 'AES-256-CBC', 'AES-128-GCM-64', 'AES-128-GCM-96' and 'AES-128-GCM-128'.

remote_gateway_type.Description: Remote gateway type. Valid values: 'generic', 'avx', 'aws', 'azure', 'sonicwall' and 'oracle'.

ssl_server_pool.Description: Specify ssl_server_pool for tunnel_type 'tcp'. Default value is '192.168.44.0/24'

tunnel_type.Description: Site2Cloud Tunnel Type. Valid values: 'udp' and 'tcp'

vpc_id.Description: VPC Id of the cloud gateway.

account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

allocate_new_eip.Description: If false, reuse an idle address in Elastic IP pool for this gateway. Otherwise, allocate a new Elastic IP and use it for this gateway.

customized_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be customized for the spoke VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs. It applies to this spoke gateway onlyâ€‹.

eip.Description: Required when allocate_new_eip is false. It uses specified EIP for this gateway.

enable_active_mesh.Description: Switch to Enable/Disable Active Mesh Mode for Spoke Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

enable_encrypt_volume.Description: Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS provider. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enable_vpc_dns_server.Description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Only supports AWS. Valid values: true, false.

filtered_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or itâ€™s subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gatewayâ€™s routing table. It applies to this spoke gateway only.

gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway which is going to be created.

ha_cloud_instance_id.Description: Cloud instance ID of HA spoke gateway.

ha_eip.Description: Public IP address that you want assigned to the HA Spoke Gateway.

ha_insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Spoke HA Gateway. Required if insane_mode is true and ha_subnet is set.

ha_subnet.Description: HA Subnet. Required if enabling HA for AWS/AZURE.

ha_zone.Description: HA Zone. Required if enabling HA for GCP.

included_advertised_spoke_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Included CIDR List'. When configured, it will replace all advertised routes from this VPC.â€‹

insane_mode.Description: Enable Insane Mode for Spoke Gateway. Valid values: true, false. If insane mode is enabled, gateway size has to at least be c5 size.

insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Spoke Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled for aws cloud.

private_ip.Description: Private IP address of the spoke gateway created.

security_group_id.Description: Security group used for the spoke gateway.

single_az_ha.Description: Set to 'enabled' if this feature is desired.

single_ip_snat.Description: Specify whether to enable Source NAT feature in 'single_ip' mode on the gateway or not.

account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

enable_nat.Description: Specify whether enabling NAT feature on the gateway or not.

gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway which is going to be created.

ha_subnet.Description: HA Subnet. Required if enabling HA for AWS/AZURE.

ha_zone.Description: HA Zone. Required if enabling HA for GCP.

single_az_ha.Description: Set to 'enabled' if this feature is desired.

inspected_resource_name.Description: Name of the resource to be added to transit firenet policy.

transit_firenet_gateway_name.Description: Name of the transit firenet gateway.

account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

allocate_new_eip.Description: If false, reuse an idle address in Elastic IP pool for this gateway. Otherwise, allocate a new Elastic IP and use it for this gateway.

bgp_manual_spoke_advertise_cidrs.Description: Intended CIDR list to advertise to VGW.

cloud_instance_id.Description: Instance ID of the transit gateway.

cloud_type.Description: Type of cloud service provider, requires an integer value. Use 1 for AWS.

customized_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be customized for the spoke VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs. It applies to all spoke gateways attached to this transit gateway.

eip.Description: Required when allocate_new_eip is false. It uses specified EIP for this gateway.

enable_active_mesh.Description: Switch to Enable/Disable Active Mesh Mode for Transit Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

enable_advertise_transit_cidr.Description: Switch to Enable/Disable advertise transit VPC network CIDR.

enable_encrypt_volume.Description: Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS provider. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enable_firenet.Description: Specify whether to enable firenet interfaces or not.

enable_hybrid_connection.Description: Sign of readiness for TGW connection.

enable_transit_firenet.Description: Specify whether to enable transit firenet interfaces or not.

enable_vpc_dns_server.Description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Only supports AWS. Valid values: true, false.

excluded_advertised_spoke_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Excluded CIDR List'. When configured, it inspects all the advertised CIDRs from its spoke gateways and remove those included in the 'Excluded CIDR List'.

filtered_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or itâ€™s subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gatewayâ€™s routing table. It applies to all spoke gateways attached to this transit gateway.

gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway which is going to be created.

ha_cloud_instance_id.Description: Cloud instance ID of HA transit gateway.

ha_eip.Description: Public IP address that you want assigned to the HA Transit Gateway.

ha_gw_size.Description: HA Gateway Size. Mandatory if HA is enabled (ha_subnet is set).

ha_insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit HA Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled and ha_subnet is set.

ha_subnet.Description: HA Subnet. Required for enabling HA for AWS/AZURE gateway.

ha_zone.Description: HA Zone. Required if enabling HA for GCP.

insane_mode.Description: Enable Insane Mode for Transit. Valid values: true, false. If insane mode is enabled, gateway size has to at least be c5 size.

insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled.

private_ip.Description: Private IP address of the transit gateway created.

security_group_id.Description: Security group used for the transit gateway.

single_az_ha.Description: Set to 'enabled' if this feature is desired.

single_ip_snat.Description: Enable or disable Source NAT feature in 'single_ip' mode for this container.

transit_gateway_name1.Description: The first transit gateway name to make a peer pair.

transit_gateway_name2.Description: The second transit gateway name to make a peer pair.

account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

cloud_type.Description: Type of cloud service provider, requires an integer value. Use 1 for AWS.

enable_firenet_interfaces.Description: Specify whether to enable firenet interfaces or not.

enable_hybrid_connection.Description: Sign of readiness for TGW connection.

gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway which is going to be created.

ha_gw_size.Description: HA Gateway Size. Mandatory if HA is enabled (ha_subnet is set).

ha_insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit HA Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled and ha_subnet is set.

insane_mode.Description: Enable Insane Mode for Transit. Valid values: true, false. If insane mode is enabled, gateway size has to at least be c5 size.

insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled.

enable_ha.Description: Whether Peering HA is enabled. Valid inputs: true or false.

gw_name1.Description: The first VPC Container name to make a peer pair.

gw_name2.Description: The second VPC Container name to make a peer pair.

bgp_local_as_num.Description: BGP Local ASN (Autonomous System Number). Integer between 1-65535.

bgp_vgw_account.Description: Account of AWS's VGW that is used for this connection.

bgp_vgw_id.Description: Id of AWS's VGW that is used for this connection.

bgp_vgw_region.Description: Region of AWS's VGW that is used for this connection.

conn_name.Description: The name of for Transit GW to VGW connection connection which is going to be created.

vpc_id.Description: VPC-ID where the Transit Gateway is located.

account_name.Description: Account name. This account will be used to create an Aviatrix VPC.

aviatrix_firenet_vpc.Description: Specify the VPC as Aviatrix FireNet VPC or not. Required to be false for GCP provider.

aviatrix_transit_vpc.Description: Specify the VPC as Aviatrix Transit VPC or not. Required to be false for GCP provider.

cidr.Description: Subnet of the VPC to be created. Required to be empty for GCP provider, and non-empty for other providers.

name.Description: Name of the VPC to be created.

region.Description: Region of cloud provider. Required to be empty for GCP provider, and non-empty for other providers.

subnets.Description: List of subnets of the VPC to be created. Required to be non-empty for GCP provider, and empty for other providers.

base_rule.Description: Base policy rule of  the profile to be added. Enter 'allow_all' or 'deny_all'.

policy.Description: New security policy for the profile.

action.Description: The opposite of the base rule for correct behaviour. 'allow' or 'deny'.

port.Description: Port to be allowed or denied.

target.Description: CIDR to be allowed or denied.

users.Description: List of VPN users to attach to this profile.

gw_name.Description: If ELB is enabled, this will be the name of the ELB, else it will be the name of the Aviatrix VPN gateway.

saml_endpoint.Description: This is the name of the SAML endpoint to which the user is to be associated.

vpc_id.Description: VPC Id of Aviatrix VPN gateway.

elb_name.Description: ELB to include into the VPN User Accelerator.

account_name.Description: Account name. This can be used for logging in to CloudN console or UserConnect controller.

aws_account_number.Description: AWS Account number to associate with Aviatrix account.

firewall_instance_association.Description: List of firewall instances associated with fireNet.

attached.Description: Switch to attach/detach firewall instance to/from fireNet.

egress_interface.Description: Egress interface ID, required if it is a firewall instance.

firenet_gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway to launch the firewall instance.

firewall_name.Description: Firewall instance name, or FQDN Gateway's gw_name, required if it is a firewall instance.

instance_id.Description: ID of Firewall instance, or FQDN Gateway's gw_name.

lan_interface.Description: Lan interface ID, required if it is a firewall instance.

management_interface.Description: Management interface ID, required if it is a firewall instance.

vendor_type.Description: Indication it is a firewall instance or FQDN gateway to be associated to fireNet. Valid values: 'Generic', 'fqdn_gateway'. Value 'fqdn_gateway' is required for FQDN gateway.

password.Description: Firewall login password for API calls.

public_ip.Description: The public IP address of the firewall management interface for API calls from the Aviatrix Controller.

retry_interval.Description: Retry interval in seconds for `save` or `synchronize`.

route_table.Description: Specify the firewall virtual Router name you wish the Controller to program. If left unspecified, the Controller programs the firewallâ€™s default router.

username.Description: Firewall login name for API calls from the Controller. For example, admin-api, as shown in the screen shot.

vendor_type.Description: Select PAN. Valid values: 'Generic', 'Palo Alto Networks VM-Series' and 'Aviatrix FQDN Gateway'.

account_name.Description: Account name. This can be used for logging in to CloudN console or UserConnect controller.

gw_name.Description: Gateway name. This can be used for getting gateway.

public_ip.Description: Public IP address of the Gateway created.

account_name.Description: Name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

allocate_new_eip.Description: Whether the eip is newly allocated or not.

customized_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be customized for the spoke VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs. It applies to this spoke gateway onlyâ€‹.

enable_active_mesh.Description: Enable/Disable Active Mesh Mode for Spoke Gateway.

enable_encrypt_volume.Description: Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS provider.

filtered_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or itâ€™s subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gatewayâ€™s routing table. It applies to this spoke gateway only.

gw_name.Description: Spoke gateway name. This can be used for getting spoke gateway.

included_advertised_spoke_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Included CIDR List'. When configured, it will replace all advertised routes from this VPC.â€‹

insane_mode.Description: Enable/Disable Insane Mode for Spoke Gateway.

insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Spoke Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled for aws cloud.

public_ip.Description: Public IP address of the spoke gateway created.

subnet.Description: Range of the subnet where the spoke gateway is launched.

tag_list.Description: Instance tag of cloud provider. Only supported for AWS provider.

transit_gw.Description: The transit gateway that the spoke gateway is attached to.

account_name.Description: Name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

allocate_new_eip.Description: Whether the eip is newly allocated or not.

bgp_manual_spoke_advertise_cidrs.Description: Intended CIDR list to advertise to VGW.

customized_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be customized for the spoke VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs. It applies to this spoke gateway onlyâ€‹.

enable_active_mesh.Description: Enable/Disable active mesh mode for Transit Gateway.

enable_advertise_transit_cidr.Description: Enable/Disable advertise transit VPC network CIDR.

enable_encrypt_volume.Description: Enable/Disable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS provider.

enable_hybrid_connection.Description: Sign of readiness for TGW connection.

enable_vpc_dns_server.Description: Enable/Disable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Only supports AWS.

excluded_advertised_spoke_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Excluded CIDR List'. When configured, it inspects all the advertised CIDRs from its spoke gateways and remove those included in the 'Excluded CIDR List'.â€‹

filtered_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or itâ€™s subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gatewayâ€™s routing table. It applies to this spoke gateway only.

gw_name.Description: Transit Gateway name. This can be used for getting gateway.

insane_mode.Description: Enable/Disable Insane Mode for Spoke Gateway.

insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Spoke Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled for aws cloud.

public_ip.Description: Public IP address of the Transit Gateway created.

subnet.Description: Range of the subnet where the transit gateway is launched.

tag_list.Description: Instance tag of cloud provider. Only supported for AWS provider.
